response.original_title: Akmal Presents The Comedy Festival Sampler
response.overview: Akmal presents a sample of some of the best acts to appear this yearâ€™s comedy festivals around the country. This is your chance to sit back and sample some fine acts to help you make your decision before parting with your hard earned. The show features Arj Barker, Kitty Flanagan, Lawrence Mooney, Jimeoin, James Smith, Bev Killick,  Simon Taylor, Cameron James, The Stevenson Experience and of course, Akmal himself.
response.title: Akmal Presents The Comedy Festival Sampler
